text.name: sys_description
text.text: The Atari 2600 (branded as the VCS up until November 1982) is a second generation console released in 1977. It comes with a pair of joysticks a game. The 2600 was one of the most popular consoles of its generation, featuring a MOS Tech. 6507 CPU, 128b of RAM and 2 channel mono sound. It could display up to 160x192 in 128 colors (16 colors with 8 intensities). Its library features around 900 titles including original hits like Pitfall, arcade ports like Space Invaders and licensed games such as Raiders of the Lost Ark and E.T.
